column3: Tavis says this fails the `multiwallet.py` and `p2p-versionbits-warning.py`.\nI don't understand where I even touch that.\n
Needs rebase if still relevant (and see also #12041).
Closing for now, as it's not in mergeable state. Let me know if you start work on this again, then I'll reopen.
I will prepare a better PR based on 0.16.0
As a code convention to the rest of this file I think you must remove tabs and keep two spaces indentation here.
